improvement_list.improvement_desc: The variable x is initialized to 0, then immediately overwritten in the loop. The initialization is redundant and can be removed.
Division by zero is possible if y becomes 0. Add a check to handle this case.

The variable z is assigned the value x/y after the loop.  Since x is always 2 and y is 3 after loop (except for first iteration), the value of z is a constant 2/3 which can be calculated once in place of this division.
